remarks: Other elements of a structure restriction.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)
statement:
resvlem.r $e |- R = ( W |`v A ) $.
resvlem.e $e |- C = ( E ` W ) $.
resvlem.f $e |- E = Slot N $.
resvlem.n $e |- N e. NN $.
resvlem.b $e |- N =/= 5 $.
resvlem $p |- ( A e. V -> C = ( E ` R ) ) $.
